View

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • View.AdminController

  • public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller for the admin page. This class handles all the functionalities that are available for the admin.
    Author:
    Pranav Kanukollu, pvk9, Nishanth Athreya, nsa48

      This method is an event handler for clicking the logout button.
      void quit(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method is an event handler for clicking the quit button, it exits out of the program completely.
      void start()
      This method starts the controller, and opens all of the users and their respective albums and photos from the file which stores them.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        This method starts the controller, and opens all of the users and their respective albums and photos from the file which stores them.

      • quit

        public void quit(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method is an event handler for clicking the quit button, it exits out of the program completely.
        Parameters:
        e - ActionEvent object

      • logout

        public void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method is an event handler for clicking the logout button. It logs out of the admin page, but goes back to the login page.
        Parameters:
        e - ActionEvent object

      • create

        public void create(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method is an event handler for clicking the create button. This allows the admin the create a new user.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • delete

        public void delete(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method is an event handler for clicking the delete button. This allows the admin to delete a user.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • listUsers

        public void listUsers(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        This method is an event handler for clicking the list users button. This goes to a new screen and displays all the users.
        Parameters:
        e -
